histogram.name: LocalNetworkRequests.PrivatePage
histogram.summary: Number of requests made by a private page to resources besides itself.

histogram.name: LocalNetworkRequests.PublicPage
histogram.summary: Number of requests made by a public page to resources with reserved IP addresses.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.Backend
histogram.summary: Type of backend requested from the Local Search Service. It is reported once at the initialization of an Index. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.DailySearch
histogram.summary: Number of times the local search service has been requested to perform a search on a device. Reported daily. The count is accumulated through the day, spanning reboots, and sent once the system clock indicates that a full day or more has passed since the last report. If the system is suspended or off for more than a day, the current count will be reported the next time the system boots, but the skipped days will not be reported. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.MetricsDailyEventInterval
histogram.summary: Reasons why local search daily metrics were reported. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.NumberDocuments
histogram.summary: Number of documents in the corpus. Recorded each time the index is updated (documents added, updated or removed) and if the index is not empty. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.NumberResults
histogram.summary: Number of results for each successful search. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.ResponseStatus
histogram.summary: Search request response status for Cros Settings. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.SearchLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to find search results. Only recorded if search response status is success, i.e. neither index nor query is empty. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.BrowserLocalStorageCachePurgedInKB

histogram.name: LocalStorage.BrowserLocalStorageCacheSizeInKB
histogram.summary: Total size of the HTML5 LocalStorage databases in KB in the browser-side cache recorded each time a new database is opened in memory.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.MojoSizeInKB
histogram.summary: Size of the HTML5 LocalStorage DB in KB in the renderer-side cache using Mojo implementation.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.MojoTimeToPrime
histogram.summary: Time (in ms) to load HTML5 LocalStorage into the renderer-side cache using Mojo implementation.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.MojoTimeToPrimeFor{LocalStorageSizes}
histogram.summary: Time (in ms) to load HTML5 LocalStorage into the renderer-side cache using Mojo implementation, split by size. {LocalStorageSizes}

histogram.name: LocalStorage.RendererAreaCacheHit
histogram.summary: The renderer side cache hit rate metrics for new HTML5 LocalStorage DB opened.

histogram.name: LocalStorage.RendererLocalStorageSizeInKB
histogram.summary: Size of the HTML5 LocalStorage DB in KB in the renderer-side cache.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.CachePurgedInKB
histogram.summary: Total size of the HTML5 LocalStorage browser-side cache purged in KB when memory pressure signal was triggered or cache size hit the limits.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.CacheSizeInKB
histogram.summary: Total size of the HTML5 LocalStorage databases in KB in the browser-side cache. Recorded each time a new database is opened in memory.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.CommitResult
histogram.summary: The result of an attempt to commit localstorage data to the database.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.DatabaseOpenError
histogram.summary: The result of a failed attempt to open a LevelDB database for LocalStorage.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.DatabaseOpenError.Disk

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.DatabaseOpenError.Memory
histogram.summary: The result of a failed attempt to open a LevelDB database for LocalStorage in memory.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.DestroyDBResult
histogram.summary: The result of attempting to delete the LocalStorage database.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.DirectoryOpenError
histogram.summary: The reason opening a directory for the LevelDB database that backs LocalStorage failed.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.MapLoadError
histogram.summary: The reason loading an initial snapshot of the localstorage data for an origin failed.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.MigrationFixUpNeeded
histogram.summary: Whether or not any fixes needed to be made to localstorage data, as a result of bugs in the migration code in M61/M62. Recorded every time the browser loads an initial snapshot of the localstorage data for an origin.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.OnConnectionDestroyed
histogram.summary: Recorded when the database connection is closed unexpectedly.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.OpenError
histogram.summary: The reason opening the LevelDB database that backs LocalStorage failed.

histogram.name: LocalStorageContext.OpenResultAfter{LocalStorageContextOpenReasons}
